title: About the Case Where the Idol of the School Is Approaching Me as a Background Character, “Cross-dress!” - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Gender Bender   Romance   School Life
tags: Appearance Changes   Beautiful Female Lead   Clever Protagonist   Cross-dressing   Male Protagonist   Popular Love Interests
author: Minagaki Surume   Sume Mizugaki   水垣するめ
description:
“Are you interested in Cross-dressing?!”　A woman’s uniform was presented in front of me. The school idol staring at me with her eyes glistening.

I am the smartest person in the grade, but I am also always ridiculed as “weirdo” because of my round glasses and long bangs.
Then, as I was going through a normal day, she accidently saw my true girly face.
Ever since then, I am being forced to “dress as a girl!” At school …?!>
